channel.title: I am trying to make
channel.description: I am trying to make a minigame kinda like where u go thru a portal and then kill something and move on the next and kill it and so on... how do i make one of those? I know how to make the portal and all but i dont know how to make it tele u when u kill a certain NPC. I would appreciate any help. Thanks :D
